lyrics.stanza: You fill me Lord Jesus You enlighten my darkness; Your life brings me freedom Your love heals my pain Your dream is my treasure; Your majesty awes me You've filled me Lord Jesus Come fill me again.

Let Your north wind blow on me, Let Your Spirit surround me 'Til my being is open, trusting You once again. Then burn and consume me With Your jealous God's fire 'Til my being is obedient, 'Til my soul You have gained.
